In 2017, the institution also gained recognition for its role in the establishment of the Nairobi Art Museum (NAMA); a privately operated museum dedicated to the life and work of African art and architecture; and the Nairobi Architecture Biennial, a series of exhibitions and residencies organized by the city of Nairobi.In addition, NAMA received a 2018 grant from the British Museum in London and the Nairobi Art Museum (NAMA) has been awarded a $1.6 million grant in 2017.
